org.apache.reef.runtime.common.driver.task

Class RunningTaskImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.reef.runtime.common.driver.task.RunningTaskImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, RunningTask, Identifiable

    public final class RunningTaskImpl
extends Object
implements RunningTask
    Implements the RunningTask client interface. It is mainly a helper class that will package up various client method calls into protocol buffers and pass them to its respective EvaluatorManager to deliver to the EvaluatorRuntime.
